```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
```

```{r dataset}

earthquakedata <- read_csv("data/earthquakedata.csv")
```

### Data

```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr==1995) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```

### Terremotos mayores

```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr==1995, mag>7.5) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon,
             lat = ~lat, 
             label = ~mag )
```




***

El mapa podemos ver que los mayores terremotos sucesdieron en los paises de,

- Japon
- Chile
